type.description: The type of the item. Always `function_call`.

id.description: The unique ID of the function call item.

call_id.description: The unique ID of the function tool call that was generated.

name.description: The name of the function that was called.

arguments.description: The arguments JSON string that was generated.

status.description: The status of the function call item that was recorded.

created_by.description: The identifier of the actor that created the item.

title: Function call
description: A function tool call that was generated by the model.
